alert.note: Alert for Acadia; Allen; Evangeline; Jefferson Davis (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 24 at 9:39PM CST until further notice by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Louisiana... Bayou Nezpique Near Basile Mermentau River Near Mermentau ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Louisiana... Vermilion River At Lafayette, Surrey Street Gage Bayou Des Cannes Near Eunice Bayou Vermilion Near Carencro Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Thursday evening at 945 PM CST. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY AFTERNOON UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Bayou Nezpique near Basile. * WHEN...From Thursday afternoon until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 27.0 feet, Flooding occurs on portions of Riverside Road north of Saint Jules Road and the road is subject to closure. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 PM CST Wednesday the stage was 11.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early tomorrow afternoon and continue rising to a crest of 26.5 feet early Saturday afternoon. - Flood stage is 22.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
